channel.title: VN on Wonderful World
channel.description: Recent content in VN on Wonderful World

item.title: Hạ Long Bay
item.description: Multiple tree-covered limestone islands dot this scenic diving, rock climbing & hiking destination.

item.title: Mù Cang Chải
item.description: Mù Cang Chải manages to be one of the most breathtaking spots in Vietnam, with terraced rice fields and mountainous landscapes.

item.title: Sơn Đoòng Cave
item.description: According to the Limberts, the cave is five times larger than nearby caves like Phong Nha Cave and Hang En, the third largest cave in the world previously considered the biggest cave in Vietnam. The main passage in Sơn Đoòng is more than 5 kilometres (3.1 mi) long, 200 metres (660 ft) high and 150 metres (490 ft) wide.
